WorkItem.ClosedComment:
As part of our move to GitHub, we're closing our CodePlex suggestions and asking that people move them to the GitHub issue tracker for further discussion.  Some feature requests may already be active on GitHub, so please make sure to look for an existing issue before filing a new one.

You can find our GitHub issue tracker here:
https://github.com/microsoft/typeScript/issues
WorkItem.Description:
As of WebEssentials 3.0 the custom regions ```\\#region MyRegion ... \\#endregion``` no longer collapse in the VS 2012 editor. This is likely due to all TypeScript support being removed from WE 3.0. Also the TS editor in the VS 2013 Preview TypeScript tooling also does not seem to have this feature.

Please add collapsible custom region support to the TypeScript editor tooling.
WorkItem.Summary: Add collapsible regions in the TS editor tooling

Comments.Message: Thanks for the suggestion. We'll be looking at a number of new IDE features going forward.

yep it could be very helpfull
thank you
